import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Modal, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './verticalmenu.css'; // Adjust the path as necessary import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import backgroundLogo from '../images/Carecloud.png'; import Set_Up from '../images/Set_up.png'; import Plus from '../images/istockphoto-832142860-612x612__1_-removebg-preview.png'; const VerticalMenu = () => { const [activeMenu, setActiveMenu] = useState(null); // Active menu state for dropdown const [showAddUserModal, setShowAddUserModal] = useState(false); // Modal visibility for Add System Users // Function to toggle dropdown menu const toggleDropdown = (menu) => { setActiveMenu((prevMenu) => (prevMenu === menu ? null : menu)); }; // Modal open/close functions const openAddUserModal = () => setShowAddUserModal(true); const closeAddUserModal = () => setShowAddUserModal(false); return (
    {/* Set Up Menu with Dropdown */}
